nodes.text: Mercy was a Lambda-class T-4a shuttle in service to the Rebel Alliance. The shuttle was used in a rescue operation near Stars' End to board the BFF-1 bulk freighter Hampton and rescue two Rebel pilots, while two Alliance-flown Y-wings held off the escort frigate Furious's attacks long enough for the Mercy to rescue the two pilots and escape into hyperspace.
For unknown reasons the briefing in the mission address the ship as Oola. But in the game mission and the mission objectives it is identified as Mercy. This article assumes the shuttle is Mercy.
